questions.questionText: Find the name of the student who has maximum GPA.
Find the Average GPA of the students who applied for ‘MIT’
Find number of students applied for ‘Stanford’
Find the name of college with minimum enrollments.
Find all the students who are applied for ‘CS’ and ‘EE’ and whose GPA is less than 3.5

Insert the data into Student table by executing following command
insert into Student values(420, ’kevin’, null, 5000)
Find the name of all the students whose GPA is not null
